    7: %%% Created : 27. 十月 2014 下午5:37
    8: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    9: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
   10: -author("huancj").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: 
   13: %% API
   14: -export([all/0, 
   15:          init_per_suite/1, 
   16:          end_per_suite/1, 
   17:          init_per_testcase/2, 
   18:          friend_by_name/1]).
   19: 
   20: all() -> [add_service, friend_by_name].
   21: 
   22: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   23:     Priv = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   24:     application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   25:     mafiapp:install([node()]),
   26:     application:start(mnesia),
   27:     application:start(mafiapp),
   28:     Config.
   29: 
   30: init_per_testcase(add_service, Config) ->
   31:     Config;
   32: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   33:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("panxh", [], [boss], erlang),
   34:     Config.
   35: 
   36: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   37:     application:stop(mnesia),
   38:     ok.
   39: 
   40: 
   41: friend_by_name(_Config) ->
   42:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("panxh", [{phone, "8888888"}, 
   43:                                       {email, "qhhd@qhhd.cn"},
   44:                                       {other, "boss"}],
   45:                                       [{born, {1983,1,1}},
   46:                                       boss, china], erlang),
   47:     {"panxh", _Contact, _Info, erlang, _Services} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("panxh"),
   48:     undefined = mafiapp:friend_by_name(make_ref()).
   49: 
   50:
